Room.Name: Ministry Way/Lelion Way Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Lelion Way and Ministry Way.
Room.LongDescription: Ministry Way runs north from the intersection with Lelion Way, which runs east and west. Ministry Way runs past the North Oceancrest Ministries of Tranquility, Discipline and Rumor Control. Lelion Way runs east and west across the north side of the Wakarimasu Park.
